masonGlue
Class ParametrizedForagingHoneyBeeSimulation

java.lang.Object
  sim.engine.SimState
      masonGlue.ForagingHoneyBeeSimulation
          masonGlue.ParametrizedForagingHoneyBeeSimulation
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAgentLocator, java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable
public class ParametrizedForagingHoneyBeeSimulation
extends ForagingHoneyBeeSimulation

This class provides only some public getter and setter methods hence simulation properties can be accessed by a MASON panel and an attached inspector.

This class allows the access to the properties:

  • Maximum number of bees ForagingHoneyBeeSimulation.maxBees,
  • control over the avoidance of obstacles ForagingHoneyBeeSimulation.avoidObstacles,
  • the maximum number of search steps when a bee a searching a food source ForagingHoneyBeeSimulation.maxSearchSteps,
  • the communication noise ForagingHoneyBeeSimulation.comNoise when bees exchanging information,
  • the probability a bee forgets about its food source ForagingHoneyBeeSimulation.pForgettingSource,
  • the probability a bee starts foraging again ForagingHoneyBeeSimulation.pForagingAgain,
  • the probability a bee starts scouting ForagingHoneyBeeSimulation.pStartScouting,
  • the colony nectar need ForagingHoneyBeeSimulation.colonyNectarNeed,
  • access to the hives in the simulation getHives(),
  • access to the food sources in the simulation getFoodSources(),
  • access to the obstacles in the simulation getObstacles().

Copyright 2009 Joerg Hoehne

Author:
hoehne (Jörg Höhne)
